content:
You're welcome! I hope you find some exciting theater festivals or events to attend. Remember to also keep an eye on the smaller, independent theater downtown, as they might have some unique productions or events that you won't want to miss.

It's great that you're getting involved in the local theater community, and I'm sure you'll have a blast attending more productions, taking improv classes, and volunteering as an usher. Who knows, you might even discover a new passion or talent!

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, break a leg, and enjoy the world of theater!
